title: Authors and Citation
text: Liang Zhang. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Zhang L (2025). data.iquizoo: Useful datasets used IQUIZOO workflow. R package version 2025.06.21-1, https://github.com/psychelzh/data.iquizoo.
code: @Manual{,   title = {data.iquizoo: Useful datasets used in IQUIZOO workflow},   author = {Liang Zhang},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 2025.06.21-1},   url = {https://github.com/psychelzh/data.iquizoo}, }

what: Useful datasets used in IQUIZOO workflow
title: Useful datasets used in IQUIZOO workflow
text: goal data.iquizoo provide datasets IQUIZOO workflows.

title: Useful datasets used in IQUIZOO workflow
text: can install development version data.iquizoo GitHub : can install r-universe :

title: Useful datasets used in IQUIZOO workflow
text: main parts package dataset: game_info containing basic information games. simple example: functions also provided help work datasets. example:
code: library(data.iquizoo) # for long-int identifiers requireNamespace("bit64", quietly = TRUE) # show the first few rows of the data head(game_info) #>           game_id    game_name game_name_ver       game_name_en game_name_abbr #> 1 576947514081349   2-back任务                    Two Back CAMP     Nback2CAMP #> 2 770528428376709 CMAT数学测试                                                 #> 3 305067065282821  Sandia推理A         1.0.0 Sandia Reasoning A        SandiaA #> 4 305067236323525  Sandia推理B               Sandia Reasoning B        SandiaB #> 5 306923687555141  Sandia推理C               Sandia Reasoning C        SandiaC #> 6 306923906232453  Sandia推理D               Sandia Reasoning D        SandiaD #>   game_id_parallel #> 1             <NA> #> 2             <NA> #> 3             <NA> #> 4  305067065282821 #> 5  305067065282821 #> 6  305067065282821 library(data.iquizoo) # some other useful functions game_id <- bit64::as.integer64(305067065282821) match_info(game_id, to = "game_name") #> [1] "Sandia推理A" merge_preproc(data.frame(game_id = game_id)) #>           game_id     prep_fun  tag input extra #> 1 305067065282821 countcorrect <NA>  NULL  NULL

title: Useful datasets used in IQUIZOO workflow
text: develop github flow simplicity package.

title: Game information — game_info
text: alternative names games supported IQUIZOO.COM.

title: Game information — game_info
text: data frame 350 rows following variables: game_id Game id, 64-bit integer. game_name Game name Chinese, matching database. game_name_ver Game version name, matching database. game_name_en English game name, added researchers (esp. ). game_name_abbr English game name abbreviated, added researchers (esp. ). game_id_parallel Parallel form game id. parallel form, NA.

what: Match specific piece of information of games — match_info
title: Match specific piece of information of games — match_info
text: Match specific piece information games

title: Match specific piece of information of games — match_info
Match specific piece of information of games — match_info
text: x known information games. name column information matched. name column known information. fail_on_missing Whether stop information matched.

title: Match specific piece of information of games — match_info
text: matched information.

title: Match pre-processing parameters — merge_preproc
text: complex parameters stored internally, users must retrieve function.

title: Match pre-processing parameters — merge_preproc
code: merge_preproc(   games,   ...,   filter_only = FALSE,   rm_tagged = FALSE,   name_key = "game_id" )

title: Match pre-processing parameters — merge_preproc
text: games data.frame contains games match parameters. ... Additional arguments passed merge(). filter_only Whether perform filtering , .e., keep matched games. rm_tagged Whether remove games tagged pre-processing function. Default FALSE. name_key name column match games.

title: Match pre-processing parameters — merge_preproc
text: data.frame added pre-processing parameters. Note match game, matched parameters empty vectors (e.g., NULL).

title: data.iquizoo 2025.06.21-1
text: Finish upkeeping package. Fix test cases.

title: data.iquizoo 2025.06.21
text: Added newly developed games.

title: data.iquizoo 2024.07.14
text: Added newly developed game.

title: data.iquizoo 2024.04.13
text: Added one newly developed game. Removed game_indices now, unstable keep.

title: data.iquizoo 2024.04.11
text: Removed rtsd index TOVA related games. index highly correlated dprime index.

title: data.iquizoo 2024.04.07
text: Added indices two types games.

title: data.iquizoo 2024.04.03
text: Matched pre-processing functions.

title: data.iquizoo 2024.03.31-2
text: Added ... pass additional arguments merge() merge_preproc().

title: data.iquizoo 2024.03.31-1
text: Removed screen_indices() function. Renamed match_preproc() merge_preproc(). Now dplyr required package.

title: data.iquizoo 2024.03.31
text: Let missing values game_name_ver column game_info empty strings ("").

title: data.iquizoo 2024.03.29-1
text: Add fail_on_missing match_info() control whether fail found unmatched ids.

title: data.iquizoo 2024.03.29
text: Use memory_score index DRM task.

title: data.iquizoo 2024.03.28
text: Added recent new games without names.

title: data.iquizoo 2024.02.23
text: Enhanced parameters match_info().

title: data.iquizoo 2024.02.03-1
text: Fixed pre-processing functions one newly added game.

title: data.iquizoo 2024.02.03
text: Added tasks used recent training.

title: data.iquizoo 2024.01.23
text: Added screen_indices() screen unused indices.

title: data.iquizoo 2024.01.22
text: Added match_info() extract different pieces game information.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.12.08
text: Support tagging specific pre-processing functions. pre-processing function tagged, signals experimental may work expected. useful newly developed pre-processing functions. Add rm_tagged argument match_preproc() remove tagged pre-processing functions.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.11.04
text: Support type argument match_preproc() specify type join use.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.11.03
text: Added game_id_parallel track parallel forms games.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.10.29
text: Added preprocessing function creativity related tasks. Added preprocessing function category retrieval fluency tasks. Supported multiple main indices.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.10.22
text: Moved prep_fun column just game_id results calling match_preproc().

title: data.iquizoo 2023.10.22
text: Removed prep_fun_name, input extra columns game_info table. Added match_preproc() function match pre-processing parameters games.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.10.06
text: Split game_info two tables: game_info game_indices.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.10.05-1
text: Correct name type last added column.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.10.05
text: Added new column indicate whether main index reversed .

title: data.iquizoo 2023.10.04
text: Added new column set name one main index task.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.10.03
text: Fix prep_fun_name QA version Face Name task. Now uses preproc.iquizoo::countcorrect().

title: data.iquizoo 2023.07.19
text: Fixed wrong names Stroop Birds tasks.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.07.18
text: Supported short version tasks.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.05.09
text: Added mainly "Remote Association Test" task. Added movie related tasks. Added miscellanous tasks.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.03.29
text: Added "Sleepiness" task.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.03.25
text: Corrected several info online updating. Used preproc.iquizoo::capacity() visual arrays tasks.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.03.14
text: Added back visual memory study.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.03.04
text: Fixed broken raw data several games. Correct name “Reading” task.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.03.03
text: Removed one game data storage . Added preprocessing function name several newly added games.

title: data.iquizoo 2023.02.27
text: Changed version YYYY.MM.DD format. make version number informative release date. Added recently developed games.

title: data.iquizoo 0.3.1
text: Changed version name game_name_ver.

title: data.iquizoo 0.3.0
text: Support VersionName update new column named "version_name" game_info table.

title: data.iquizoo 0.2.1
text: Added games.

title: data.iquizoo 0.2.0
text: Changed game_id class bit64::integer64. default class values fetched database values.

title: data.iquizoo 0.2.0
text: Updated game_info newest version.

title: data.iquizoo 0.1.2
text: Update prep_fun_name two games: RAPM AntiSac. Fix extra n-back games.

title: data.iquizoo 0.1.1
text: Store input extra strings rlang::expr_text().

title: data.iquizoo 0.1.0
text: Remove obsolete data config_prep_fun merged info game_info. Basically, input extra can configured .

title: data.iquizoo 0.0.14
text: add temporary game SchulteGrid(research)

title: data.iquizoo 0.0.13
text: Updated game_id column game_info data numeric values .

title: data.iquizoo 0.0.12
text: Use reinf() reinforcement learning tests. Added tests.

title: data.iquizoo 0.0.11
text: Modified english names tests reduce conflicts.

title: data.iquizoo 0.0.10
text: Use preproc.iquizoo::span() location memory.

title: data.iquizoo 0.0.9
text: Use preproc.iquizoo::countcorrect2() directed search.

title: data.iquizoo 0.0.8
text: Mapped new pre-processing functions newly developed tests.

title: data.iquizoo 0.0.7
text: Corrected game name typo.

title: data.iquizoo 0.0.6
text: Rename “Dual 1-back” “Dual 2-back” design change.

title: data.iquizoo 0.0.5
text: Added latest completed games.

title: data.iquizoo 0.0.4
text: Corrected abbreviated name multiple object tracking game.

title: data.iquizoo 0.0.3
text: Added config_prep_fun default example configuration pre-processing functions.

title: data.iquizoo 0.0.2
text: Updated game_info keep latest development.

title: data.iquizoo 0.0.0.9000
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package. Added game_info dataset store correponding pre-processing functions games.
